ecmaVersion.doc: The ECMAScript version to parse. Should be either 5 or 6. Default is 6.

loadEagerly.doc: loadEagerly allows you to force some files to always be loaded, it may be an array of filenames or glob patterns (i.e. foo/bar/*.js).

dontLoad.doc: The dontLoad option can be used to prevent Tern from loading certain files. It also takes an array of file names or glob patterns.
